timeline.message: remove share permission for receivers of a shared config
adds add-Method for config to mastermeta storage
assigns default empty collections to CQConcept
translated configurations that are added to the store upon adding the configuration
only translates configurations that hold namespaced ids
adds missing negation in translation of form values

timeline.message: introduces external and internal representation of formconfig to evade id creation conflict
make visitor-pattern and id collection more defensive
